front.title: Ghhhk
front.gametext: During the damage segment of a battle you lost, if you have no cards left that can be forfeited, cancel all remaining battle damage. (Immune to Sense.) OR Cancel Nightfall.
front.lore: Dejarik of creature from Clak'dor VII. Ghhhk rise with the dawn, screeching their mating calls across the jungle. Locals use their skin oils as a healing salve.

combo: Ghhhk + Imperial Holotable + Mosep Mosep should be one of the prime force drain members, as the loss will come straight from the Light Side Reserve Deck.

Ghhhk + Sunsdown + Defel Defel under "night time conditions" fits the theme of this deck perfectly, as he can avoid combat, thus saving the use of the Ghhhk, and still be there for the counter attack.
cancels: All remaining battle damage if you just forfeited all cards that participated in a battle you lost
